info.title: Customer Profitability
info.description:
Our Customer Profitability API provides access to the calculation output of our Customer Profitability module of Temenos Analytics. This module calculates profitability using a Funds Transfer Pricing mechanism to assign a transfer rate to all products and ultimately calculate profitably at the Account, Product and Customer level. This API supplies the aggregated customer level of detail. 

**The primary purpose of this API is to allow bank users, analysts, and developers to get access to customer profitability data for reporting, analysis and data visualization**. The output can be combined with other Analytics APIs such as Customer Segmentation to further enhance the analysis.


  

For more information on Temenos Analytics, the Customer Profitability module, or our Analytics Data Store (ADS) please consult our product documentation portal.

get.description: The Customer Profitability API endpoint is based on our Analytics Data Store (ADS) and as such is optimized for time series analysis.

parameters.name: businessDate
parameters.description: Business snapshot date of the source data

businessDate.description: Business snapshot date of the source data

customerBranchName.description: Branch Name where Contract was created

maritalStatus.description: Marital status of the customer such as single; married; divorced; separated

customerMonthlyNetIncome.description: This value is the sum of the MonthlyNetIncome for all accounts for this customer.  Account MonthlyNetIncome is calculated in the InsightPricing module and rolled up to the customer level.

customerMonthlySpreadIncome.description: SpreadRate * Balance.  SpreadRate is calculated in InsightPricing as the difference between the effective rate and the Funds Transfer Rate.  The account values are rolled up to the customer level

customerMonthlyCosts.description: Monthly costs per customer.  This is calculated in InsightPricing from period cost values and transactions costs.

customerMonthlyFeeIncome.description: Monthly service fee income from the customer.  This is calculated in InsightPricing from service fees and charges for each account and rolled up to the customer level.

accounts.description: The total number of accounts the customer has

products.description: The total number of products the customer has.  Each unique classification counts as one product.  Eg. 2 Savings accounts and 2 loan accounts would be 2 products.   Sometimes products such as Membership or Overdrafts are excluded from the count.

customerNumber.description: The customer number or customer identification number

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
